items.title: OpenAI has begun building out its robotics team
items.description: Previously, OpenAI partnered with robotics startup Figure to provide the models powering the latter's humanoid robots.

items.title: Google DeepMind researchers introduce new benchmark to improve LLM factuality, reduce hallucinations
items.description: Based on a new benchmark, Google DeepMind found Gemini 2.0 Flash to be the most factual LLM, with a score of 83.6%.

items.title: Researchers improved AI agent performance on unfamiliar tasks using ‘Dungeons and Dragons’
items.description: AgentRefine gives AI agents and models the ability to recognize errors and self-correct to work better for general tasks.

items.title: Breaking the data bottleneck: Salesforce’s ProVision speeds multimodal AI training with image scene graphs
items.description: Salesforce is using structured representation of image semantics to power programs that synthesize instruction datasets for AI training.

items.title: Self-invoking code benchmarks help you decide which LLMs to use for your programming tasks
items.description: LLMs are good at coding simple functions. But how good are they at calling their own functions to solve complex problems?
